name: LARVE
short_description:
Logic and Data Model for Population Modeling, aiming to reproduce real time demographics and evolution over time, it allows for variable configuration and initialization, evolution rules can depend on data such as genetics, social, psychological data. 

LARVE should be able to model biological populations in scientific research, but also social network modeling for businesses, and be used in targeting advertising populations for market research simulations, among other. The configuration and design aims to ignorant of the application purpose.

This project is in the very early stages. It is programmed in Java, following an Extreme and RAD development model.
summary: Population Model for Evolutionary Variable Configuration
